level.text: Money for reasonable and necessary expenses ordinarily incidental to raffles shall be paid from the gross receipts only by checks having consecutive numbers drawn on the raffle bank account established according to ยง1506.
No expense, including compensation, shall be incurred or amounts paid based on a percentage of gross receipts or net proceeds from a raffle.
Each check drawn on the raffle bank account shall be made payable to the specific payee providing the goods or rendering the service which gives rise to the expense.
No expense shall be incurred or amounts paid in connection with a raffle by any licensed organization, except those reasonable expended and directly related to the raffle.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to May 20, 1988, the D.C. Lottery and Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking at 29 DCR 5016, 5036 (November 12, 1982).
